articles.description: GoVols247 takes an in-depth look at how fifth-ranked Tennessee matches up with Missouri in Saturday’s home finale at Neyland Stadium.
articles.content: GoVols247 takes an in-depth look at how fifth-ranked Tennessee matches up with Missouri in Saturdays home finale at Neyland Stadium.
